Text: Yes, this is the original lie that the Devil told Eve. As soon as you eat this fruit, your eyes will open and you'll be as gods. The "new religion" says we are all slowly becoming gods, that as long as you're "spiritual" you don't need to be religious. All lies and deception. There is a Jesus Christ who is soon to return for His people and He will also judge his world and eventually put an end to sin and death. All who continue to hold onto sin and refuses to let Jesus cleanse them of it will be destroyed in the fire, along with the devil.
jesus is a myth, theres no 2nd coming other than in the porn section
